headline.print_headline: Images of Lung Damage From Secondhand Smoke
headline.seo: Lung Damage - Secondhand Smoke - Medicine and Health
headline.main: Cause and Effect: Images of Lung Damage From Secondhand Smoke

docs.lead_paragraph: Researchers say that for the first time, they have been able to get an image of lungs apparently damaged by secondhand tobacco smoke.
docs.snippet: Researchers say that for the first time, they have been able to get an image of lungs apparently damaged by secondhand tobacco smoke.
